pages.text: You are Oberon, a powerful wizard of the kingdom of Eldoria. Legend speaks of a mysterious tower, the Tower of Magnus, said to contain countless treasures and ancient magical knowledge. You have decided to undertake this journey. Your first obstacle? The Endless Desert, a place of scorch and illusions. Are you ready for adventure?
The desert heat is almost unbearable. The sand flows through your fingers as you walk, each step a reminder of your determination.

options.text: Use a spell to protect yourself from the heat
Continue walking, trusting in your endurance

pages.text: You concentrate, your magic staff glows as you prepare your spell. Your energy infuses the ground, ready to respond to your call when needed.
With a gesture of your staff, a cool breeze begins to blow around you, easing the desert heat. You walk more easily, but you realize you're not alone...

combat.name: Desert Djinn
combat.victory_text: After a tough battle, you defeat the Desert Djinn and find a red key among its remains.
combat.defeat_text: The Desert Djinn defeats you with a powerful blow. You have been defeated.

pages.text: You continue walking, despite the heat and thirst. Soon you realize you're not alone...

combat.name: Desert Djinn
combat.victory_text: After a tough battle, you defeat the Desert Djinn and find a red key among its remains.
combat.defeat_text: The Desert Djinn defeats you with a powerful blow. You have been defeated.

pages.text: You defeated the creature and continue your journey...

options.text: Look for a place to rest

pages.text: You successfully avoid the creature and continue your journey...

options.text: Look for a place to rest

pages.text: You find a sheltered place to rest and recharge your magical energies...
You continue to travel in the desert, in the end you spot the shape of the Tower of Magnus. You arrive in front of a red door...
After a restorative rest, you resume your journey and in the end you spot the shape of the Tower of Magnus. You arrive in front of a red door...
The red key turns in the lock with a click. The door opens and you see before you a shining object - the Lute of Power...
After circling the tower, you find no other entrances. You find yourself again in front of the red door...
